title: What Needs to Happen Before the NBA Officially Returns? | The Mismatch
description:
Now that we have a date for when the NBA will be playing games again, the focus has narrowed to what happens in the interim. We discuss the NBA’s evolving thought process on COVID-19 testing, how many players will be with their teams in Orlando, and more (0:34). Then, we briefly discuss the wing prospects in the coming NBA draft that Kevin is most excited about (49:58).

Hosts: Chris Vernon and Kevin O’Connor
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
